sentences.en: " I'm cursing the swine,'said Ah Fu.
" The swine is cursing me,'said Li.
sentences.cn: 李先生道: “ 猪猡骂我. ”

sentences.en: A swine over fat is the cause of his own bane.
Ah Fu replied , " I'm cursing you, you swine. "
sentences.cn: 阿福道: “ 骂你这猪猡. ”
女妖锡西把人变成了猪.

sentences.en: Draff is good enough for swine.
sentences.cn: 喂猪只需要用猪食(意为不作不必要的浪费).

sentences.en: Finally, they need to recognize the critical periods in swine feeding.
sentences.cn: 最后他们仍须抓住猪的饲养上的几个关键阶段.

sentences.en: He explained the beauty of the music to her but it was just casting pearls before swine.
sentences.cn: 他跟她讲解那音乐的美妙之处,但这只不过是对牛弹琴而已.
他是个傲慢的小讨厌鬼！

sentences.en: Hemolytic icterus occurs in the neonate of the horse and swine.
sentences.cn: 溶血性黄疸发生于马和猪的初生幼畜.

sentences.en: Leave her alone, you filthy swine!
sentences.cn: 不许你再缠着她，你这无耻的下流坯！

sentences.en: The dark - haired girl behind Winston had begun crying out'swine!
sentences.cn: 温斯顿身后的黑发姑娘喊起来: “ 猪!

sentences.en: There's always the chance of one of those swine recognizing your voice.
sentences.cn: 那群猪总有谁 听 得出你的声儿.

sentences.en: You do not value what should be valued, I see I was casting pearls before swine.
sentences.cn: 你不重视应该重视的东西，我觉得我是在对牛弹琴。

sentences.en: You rotten swine! How dare you?
sentences.cn: 你这个讨厌鬼！你竟敢这样？

words.tran_cn: 猪的；卑鄙的；猪一般的；贪婪的

phrases.tran_cn: v. 明珠暗投；对牛弹琴

trans.tran_cn: <旧>猪，<俚>讨厌鬼，下流坯，讨厌的人
trans.tran_en: someone who behaves very rudely or unpleasantly
